body.name: SmartMouth Original Activated Mouthwash - Adult Mouthwash for Fresh Breath - Oral Rinse for 24-Hour Bad Breath Relief with Twice Daily Use - Fresh Mint Flavor, 16 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE pickup February 20 - 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Innovative Adult Mouthwash: SmartMouth Original Activated Mouthwash utilizes patented Zinc Ion formula for optimal oral care
Bad Breath Mouthwash: Our oral rinse targets sulfur gas, so you can enjoy fresh breath that lasts 24 hours
Mint Mouthwash for Fresh Breath: Our original mouthwash features a refreshing, long-lasting, fresh mint flavor for all-day results
Oral Care Mouthwash Without Alcohol: SmartMouth mouthwash is alcohol-free and paraben-free, providing a comfortable rinse without any stinging or burning sensations
SmartMouth Satisfaction Guarantee: SmartMouth offers a 60-day satisfaction guarantee, providing peace of mind with your oral care purchase

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SmartMouth Clinical DDS Activated Oral Rinse combines zinc ion technology with maximum anti-plaque and anti-gingivitis benefits to help prevent bleeding gums. This patented solution promotes optimal oral and general health without sacrificing any anti-bad breath technology. SmartMouth Clinical DDS eliminates bad breath instantly and prevents it from returning for 12 hours per rinse. SmartMouth’s Clinical DDS Prescription Strength oral rinse combines zinc ion technology with maximum antiplaque and antigingivitis benefits to help prevent bleeding gums and fight gum disease. Our patented solution promotes optimal oral and general health while preventing and eliminating bad breath for 24 hours with twice daily use. SmartMouth’s Clinical DDS oral treatment uses zinc ions to eliminate and prevent bad breath without any stinging or burning sensation. Alcohol dries out your mouth, making you more vulnerable to bad breath, tooth decay, and gum disease. SmartMouth’s maximum strength bad breath treatment uses the power of zinc ions to eliminate and prevent bad breath for 12 hours with every rinse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I smoke cigars and I use this mouthwash every night I have a cigar. It works significantly better than "standard" mouthwash in cleaning and removing the cigar breath. It can be a little difficult to open and the price is high, but it is a justified cost for my use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars KILLS (not masks) serious halitosis
reviews.reviewText: I'm so sad that I just now found this. As someone who has dealt with halitosis all my life (due to some metabolic thing, according to docs), this is an actual game changer in the truest sense. I literally almost wept & am recommending it to everyone. Until you know how bad breath affects every part of your life, you won't appreciate why this stuff is such a miracle.Getting started with it was tricky. First off, I was a bit thrown by the instructions for getting it set up to use. Once I understood that part, I didn't get all the plastic torn off of one of the 2 dispensers so only the clear liquid was coming out. Got THAT sorted and all was well. ( So... TIP: make sure that the plastic covering is completely off BOTH chambers before first use or you'll end up with just one of the liquids needed.)The taste is, of course, nothing like alcohol-based mouthwashes. It doesn't bother me while I'm swishing & gargling but there is a bit of after-taste. It's a very mild hydrogen peroxide flavor. I do not care. This is worth whatever as long as it keeps the bad breath away - and it does.I have used almost every kind of remedy there is for halitosis & some worked okay but only for a short period of time. This is the only one EVER that lasted all day & longer. I used it at night & woke up with clean breath for the first time in my life.The one thing about this setup is that you can't travel with it. The travel system looks like a 2-bottle situation but that will be worth it!You have to tell everyone with a breath problem about this. I am hoping that the travel bottles work as well. In the meantime, I am going to get some of the mints for use away from home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not to bad
reviews.reviewText: You can feel, taste the difference. Some days a little longer than others

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good idea, poor packaging.
reviews.reviewText: The product actually works but the tool used to dispense it needs work. The liquids don't always flow equally. Poor design. I had to pour some in the lid provided then tilt the bottle lmao. Surely a better design exists.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have noticed a bug change in my spouses breathe afrer a week of using! So happy to find this product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does not prevent bad breath for 24 hours, 12 hours, or 8 hours. When you try pouring it, it also does not pour out both liquids evenly. You have to do a lot of maneuvering to try to pour equal parts of the liquid into the cap which you use as a cup. Would not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this product really works perfectly, my breath is clean all day long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars only pours out one hole
reviews.reviewText: I read all the direction 3 times before I did anything. I did as the direction said but I think the one hole is clogged. I took a paper clip to make sure there was nothing blocking the hole. Like a film from the thing you tear off. NOTHING. It still pours out of one hole. I called customer service and I got directions that are written on the bottle. Like I'm too dumb to read. I thought it was 100% guaranteed. Sort of makes me mad. It might work. But maybe in shipping, something happened. I wish everyone else much better luck.update.........I bought a different kind of smart mouth for dry mouth. This time I studied it a lot more. I used a toothpick and I got that bottle to work. I saw that when I tore off the cover there was a film left over the hole. So I went back to my other bottle and took that one apart. Then I got that one working again. I think they need to make a better bottle.

I like the fact that it has a zinc base and it works great for me. I used to have to buy this in the US so happy that I can now order in Canada through Amazon. It is certainly more pricey than most other mouthwashes but I think it is worth the price.
Caro, pero en mi opinión es el mejor enjuague bucal. Vino con su empaque de seguridad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazing results for someone on keto diet

reviews.reviewTitle: Make the dispenser easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Product is good but the dispenser is aweful. The clear liquid solution didn’t dispense in my pack. Only the blue one did. Had to pour out the entire contents into separate bottles. The lids don’t close once open. Spilled almost half of the mouthwash in the process. Bad experience
Been using this product for quite sometime, everytime i visit to the U.S i'd buy like 10btls.Good thing Amazon Japan has it now... i justwish for a much cheaper price🙏🏼
